short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Browser extension designed to provide users with a visual indicator of their progress on a webpage

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: ScrollGuide is a browser extension designed to provide users with a visual indicator of their progress on a webpage. It enhances the browsing experience by offering a subtle but informative representation of how far users have scrolled through a page.
